roleset.name: not be in a certain location
roleset.note: UNOCCUPY-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7 (usage was adjectival but called a verb). Relation to occupy.01. (from unoccupy.01-v)

example.name: unoccupy-v
example.text: Unless irrevocably ceased, and a declaration of a commitment to non-violent protest is publicly stated and adhered to, it is unlikely that Israel will "unoccupy" lands it believes are essential for its safety and security.
example.arg: lands it believes are essential for its safety and security

example.name: unoccupied-j
example.text: Please understand one truth . We have a 4 - 2 - 1 demographic structure in China , which means more and more homes will be unoccupied . By that time , those we suffer are the ones who take out a mortgage
